conversation.name: intro speach
conversation.speaker: archdemon
conversation.line: Long have we been at war with the humans. My soothsayers tell me that their legendary hero has appeared.
I have called you from the void for one purpose.
Dispose of this wretched hero and conquer the realm of mankind. Their existence is a blight on this otherwise pristine world.

conversation.name: archdemon
conversation.speaker: archdemon
conversation.line: Welcome back! I hope the war goes well.
Crush those tiny humans into dust!

conversation.name: save point description
conversation.speaker: imp
conversation.line: This thing here is a void imprinter. Stepping on it will store your consciousness in the void should you ever need to leave this plane and return later.

conversation.name: charlock war training
conversation.speaker: imp
conversation.line: I'm training these layabouts for our assault on Rimuldar to the west.

conversation.name: charlock trainee 1
conversation.speaker: tiger
conversation.line: All abilities effect the amount of elemental energy in the area. You can use the energy with Finishers. There's so much to learn.

conversation.name: charlock trainee 2
conversation.speaker: tiger
conversation.line: Finishers consume the elemental energy on battlefield. If there isn't enough energy on the battlefield when you try to use it, you will have wasted an oppurtunity.

conversation.name: charlock trainee 3
conversation.speaker: tiger
conversation.line: Thanks to the dark power of Archdemon Charon, your wounds will close completely after each battle; but that doesn't mean you will return to life.

conversation.name: charlock throne skeleton
conversation.speaker: skeleton
conversation.line: The soothsayers say that the island kingdom of Baron is where the hero was born.

conversation.name: charlock throne ghost
conversation.speaker: ghost
conversation.line: Somewhere in this world lie shrines to each of the elements: Fire, Water, Light, Dark, and Martial
